Side Effects: None_ as far as I can tell.  I have several chronic conditions_ so any potential side effects could have been explained away by me as part of these issues.
Comments: This medication changed my life for the better.  I was SO sick due to my autonomic dysfunction and all that it entailed.  I felt like I got my life back.

Side Effects: Gave me migraines_ depression and messed up my blood sugar...I became hypoglycemic.  Plus_ I experienced severe pain in my joints.  Not a good medicine for me!
